\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\&\&\& M \&\& \cdot \\
	{\,} \& {M_i } \&\& {M_k} \&\&\& {\,} \\
	\&\&\& {M_j } \&\& \cdot
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}", hook, from=1-4, to=1-6]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}"', hook, from=2-4, to=1-6]
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}", hook, from=2-4, to=3-6]
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}"', hook, from=3-4, to=3-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
